Malice:  "That's better.  I'll get the computer ready, can you get Hellplag=
ue and bring her in here?"
Blacknightmare: "Sure"said the femme and walked =
towards the room where her sis were
Hellplague:  Hellplague was looking aro=
und in Malice's room, at his various trophies and success stories.  They ma=
de her a little envious.  SHe looked up as she saw Blacknightmare approach.=
  "What's up?" she asked.
Blacknightmare: "Malice want's chat with ya, sis"=
said cmaly the femme
Hellplague/ Malice:  "Okay," The Sweep commander said,=
 getting up and going to the front of the ship.  Malice was at the controls=
 and turned around in the chair and faced Hellplague with a serious express=
ion.  She turned back to Blacknightmare. "What's going on?"
Blacknightmare:=
 "We contacted the MAximals"replied the femme "More specifically his old br=
other..."
Malice/ Hellplague:  "Blacknightmare and I have decided to go to =
the Maximal base.  They might let Blacknightmare stay, they may extent a si=
milar invitation to you.  Do you want to come with us?"  For moments there =
was silence.  Then Hellplague smirked, and let out a laugh.  "Sorry, I can'=
t do that.  I could not bring myself to live there, I'm too proud.  But ple=
ase visit sometime, okay?"
Blacknightmare:"Why not sis?? I can't leave you =
here alone... it's the best chace that we have to protect ourselfs of our f=
ormers workmates.. and Unicron himself" 
 Hellplague:  "I'll be alright.  I=
 came down here with more than just releasing Malice.  I wanted to live fre=
e, and if a little danger is involved, then so be it.  I'll be okay.  Besid=
es, I have that little maintence boy to keep me entertained, so it's not li=
keI'm all alone."
Blacknioghtmare: "But we don't know if we can trust him"
=
Hellplague:  "It will be alright.  If he get's any Ideas, I'll just have to=
 beat them out of him.  Or force him into stasis lock, or something."
Black=
nightmare: "It's your last word sis?"
Hellplague:  The taller femme put her=
 arms around her sister and hugged her.  "I'll be just fine.  Don't worry t=
oo much, it'll ruin your complexion.  I want to live here, you want to be w=
ith Malice.  We're both getting what we want, so there is nothing to be sad=
 about.  You'll be able to visit sometimes, so we'll never be out of touch.=
  So no more worrying about big sister, and worry about how you'll spend ti=
me with Malice, okay?" she said, smiling to her sister.
Blacknightmare: the=
 femme hugged her and said "Yes sis..."
Malice:  "Okay, it's settled then. =
 I transfer all control of this ship, and it's systems to you, Hellplague. =
 It's your ship now, you are in charge."  He got up and gave the Femme a hu=
g.  "You take care.  I might want to come back for some of this stuff later=
, so don't throw it out yet."
Hellplague:  "Don't worry.  Well, I suppose y=
ou two had better be going.  You can't keep them waiting too long, it would=
n't be fair."
 Blacknightmare: The femme hugged her  and said "Take care si=
s..."
Hellplague:  "I will.  You take care of Malice and yourself, okay?"
B=
lacknightmare: "Okay"said soflty the femme
Malice:  "Alright then.  We'll k=
eep in touch.  Take care," Malice said, walking over to the hatch and openi=
ng it.  "Let's go."
Blacknightmare: The femme looked towards the ship and a=
fter a sad and quick view.. she followed Malice
Malice/ Hellplague:  Malice=
 closed the hatched and took Blacknightmare's hand.  "She'll be alright, sh=
e can take care of herself.  Please don't worry about it too much."    Hell=
plague watched them leave, a twinge of sadness on her face for a moment.  "=
They'll be happier there.  I wish you two the best.  Now, I just have to wo=
rry about myself, and Celeron......"
Blacknightmare:: the femme nodded and =
followe Malice.
Malice:  After a long distance, and many silent and anxious=
 moments, they arrived at the entrance to the Maximal base.  "Well, I guess=
, we had better knock or something."
Blacknightmare: "Or ask your brother t=
hat let us come in and tell about our presence to mastr of the house"
Malic=
e:  "Well, we'd better try Kup, he's the head of security."  Malice opened =
a comm signal to the Base, hoping to get Kup's attention.  "Kup, this is Ma=
lice.  Requesting permission to enter."
KUp: "Ok I'm taking off the locks..=
. I 'm picking aunknow sighnature with ya, is she.. your lady friend?"
Mali=
ce:  "Uh, yeah," Malice said with a nervous chuckle.  The doors opened, and=
 Malice Gave Blacknightmare's hand a squeeze before starting inside slowly.=

BLacknightmare: The femme felt as if she was in middles of sort of dream..=
. All looked so irreal
Malice:  "Awfully quiet.  Kup, where are you?  Where=
 is everyone?"
Kup: Kup appeared with Elita in arms and looking to Malice s=
aid "So is she your friend?... Strange friendship, but I trust in your jude=
ment... Rodimus are chatting with a visitor and I don't know where's Organi=
cs, Windlord and MEgatron..."
Malice:  "Huh?  I would expect that of Megatr=
on, but I wonder what's going on with Organics?  Have you heard from her?"
=
Kup: "No ina while"said the male"I haven't seen her and windlord ina while"=

Malice:  "So let's give them a shout.  Organics must have been worried abo=
ut me."
Megatron Revived:  The clone emperor returned moments later, he was=
 busy scanning higher altitudes so he could find a way into unicron if he h=
ad to.  "Ah, you're back.  It's good to see you again.  I trust you know Ku=
p."
Kup: "Yes we know each other... "replied the male
Megatron Revived:  "G=
ood.  Is Rodimus still talking to Dracos?  He wanted to talk to me when he =
was finished."
Kup: "It seems"replied the femme
Megatron Revived:  "Well, w=
here is his office, I'll just wait for him there."
Kup: Kup typed some butt=
ons in a near computer and the place where the Office where appeared"There =
is... Megatron... Do you know where Organis or Windlord are?"
Megatron Revi=
ved:  "I think they are still out.  they went for some private time and I h=
ave not heard from them since."
 Malice:  "'Private time'?"
Kup: "What do y=
ou mean????"
 Megatron Revived:  "Well, they like each other.  They hold ha=
nds and such, I could only assume that is what it was."
 Kup: ""Where was t=
he last place where you saw them?"
Megatron Revived:  "A few hundred meters=
 to the east, by a big tree.  Do you think they were captured or something?=
"
Kup: "My scans reports that thier signatures had vanished...."replied wor=
ried the male"No one is around base"
 Malice:  The bounty hunter growlled, =
then let out a roar.  "NO!  DAMMIT!  The other minions must have gotten the=
m!  Damn that blasted clone!  He must be behind this!"
Kup/elita: Elita who=
 was deeply slept, woke up scared ans started to cry aloud, Kup tried to ca=
ml her down and looking to Malice said  "Good job Malice, after hours tryin=
g to slept  her you had awakened her in less than a minute..."
Malice:  "Er=
r, sorry.  It's Injustice, I'm sure that spineless little lizard has someth=
ing to do with this."
Kup: "Who's that Injustice??"
Malice:  "I was cloned,=
 and that maniac clone is Injustice.  He's got a lot of issues, and hates m=
y guts.  He'll do anything to tick me off."
Kup: "We should find out, first=
 what happened with Organcis and Windlord... "replied the male"I suggest to=
 explore the area were they where"
Malice:  "Maybe, but we should see Rodim=
us first.  We have a few things to discuss."
Kup:"Every second are vital...=
"replied the male"It's about your friend, isn't?"
Malice:  "Yes, amoung oth=
er things.  But I think Megatron should go looking for them, he's more know=
ledgeable about them and how they are together than me.  I might hurt their=
 feeligs somehow."
 Kup:"Then megatron... can you go to the area and look f=
or any proof about what had happened... I'll keep contact by complink, and =
perhaps int hat way we can solve this mistery"
Megatron Revived:  "(sigh)..=
. fine.  I'll try to find where I left them and start from there."  The lar=
ger bot turned and headed back out of the base, in the direction he left hi=
s sister and her lover.
Kup/elita: Elita still sobbed and tembled, while Ku=
p huged her in order to calm her down"Well Malice... you and your friend mu=
st be tired... Lead her towards the quarters and she can take one... I'll t=
ry to inform Rodimus about your arrivng"
